title: THE TROLLING IS WRECKING LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

embed.description: Gamer Troll, who deliberately provocative to other gamers with the intention of causing maximum disruption and argument who gains entertainment to toy others emotions without the victim's knowledge. The Gamer Troll want their victims of not noticing they're having fun to make you rage or cry in the process of doing it in the first place.

body:
Is it just me or is league getting ruined by the matches you play with 1 person or more players trolling and finding it funny to do so????

Do these idiots not understand if they behave like this the game will lose more and more players to their stupidity. Which then will lead to the game losing a lot of fans and can lead to the game shutting down.

I would like to ask league will there be so way of patrolling this as this is the real reason your losing players as people are tired of it now.

********* PLEASE COMMENT AND LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU THINK AM I RIGHT??? *********

replies.body:
Trolls, griefers, inter, w.e you want to call them do get punished. The issue is that it is punished at a slower rate as Riot wants to avoid punishing innocent players who had a bad game/wanted to try something new. It doesn't help that members of the community report frivilously when it comes to trolling.

Sion support? Reported for trolling.
Dodgeball Coach Donger (ad Donger & move reference)? Reported for trolling.
0/3/7 by 10 minutes? Reported for feeding.
riot needs to have more incentive to winning games so people actually want to win and troll less. like these split rewards are garbage, i cant even tell you what they are.

I think i have seen one troll out of hundreds of games in the last several years, and maybe two int feeders.

People need to chill, everything that pisses them off is not a troll.
Why did "That's my Horse" from Ed, Edd, & Eddy pop into my head when you said that?
I...never watched that show. I was a little too old.
